task_text: [Vaccinology][Summarization + Factual-Retrieval] List the vaccine-development phases cited in the MDPI article, then summarize how each contributes to safety assurance.

gold_end_state.summary: The MDPI article lists preclinical studies, Phase I (safety and dose-finding), Phase II (expanded safety and immunogenicity), Phase III (efficacy and rare adverse events), and post-marketing surveillance; each phase progressively increases sample size and monitoring scope to detect safety signals, refine dosing, and evaluate real-world effectiveness.

quiz.question: Which phase primarily tests efficacy and detects rare adverse events?
